doc:
Lisa Gerritsen https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lisa_Gerritsen 0 Lisa Gerritsen (born December 21, 1957) is a former American child actress. She is most famous for her role as Bess, the independent-minded daughter of Phyllis Lindstrom on the 1970s television series The Mary Tyler Moore Show and its spin-off Phyllis. Lisa_Gerritsen ( born December_21_,_1957 ) is a_former_American_child_actress . She is most_famous for her_role as Bess , the_independent-minded_daughter of Phyllis_Lindstrom on the_1970s_television_series The_Mary_Tyler_Moore_Show and its_spin-off_Phyllis .
